name: Overcast & Seriously Simple Podcasting
author: Jake Spurlock

sections.description: If you wanted to add support for Overcast payments to your podcast RSS feed this is the plugin that will do it.
sections.installation:
Installation is simple, either install automatically from the WordPress plugins repository from admin interface of your website, or, upload via FTP.

  1. Upload the /add-overcast-payments-to-seriously-simple-podcasting/ folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Update the settings in the Seriously Simple Podcast settings page.
sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

Installation is simple, either install automatically from the WordPress plugins repository from admin interface of your website, or, upload via FTP.

  1. Upload the /add-overcast-payments-to-seriously-simple-podcasting/ folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Update the settings in the Seriously Simple Podcast settings page.

Can I update the text of the link?

Possibly. Lemme know if you would like this feature.
